attributes.action: Create criminal investigation into the rape gang scandal cover up
attributes.additional_details: To find out exact numbers of girls affected and the exact extent of the cover up and to plan for future immigration policy to the UK and UK laws
attributes.background: Create an independent investigation into the cover up if the rape gangs

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
